turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Jenny, could you grab me a coffee from Peets?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, I'll grab one now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, could you also order some pizzas for work team meeting today?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course. Do you want them to arrive right at noon?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that would be great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: We have 12 people coming to the meeting. I think 3 large will be enough.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The sounds good. Make sure one is a vegi for the non-meat eaters.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will do. How about a pepperoni and a combo for the other two?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. Oh, and cheesy garlic bread too!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I don't think they have that, but they should have breadsticks and dipping sauce.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So three large pizzas and an order of breadsticks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make it two order of breadsticks and extra sauces.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I've placed the order. Should be ready in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Don't forget my coffee!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I won't! I'll be back in 30 with the food and your coffee in time for the meeting

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds good!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Later!
